      • getAccountType

        public static int getAccountType(java.lang.String username)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Using the username, gets the account type for that specified user. -2=no account; 0=customer; 1=employee; 2=admin
        Parameters:
        username - username of the account being accessed
        Returns:
        integer value of the account type as explained in description
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if SQL query fails

                         throws java.sql.SQLException

      • getApproved

        public static boolean getApproved(int accountNumber)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if account number specified is approved and returns a boolean
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the bank account being checked
        Returns:
        true if the account is approved; false if the account is pending
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if SQL query fails
